original: Clemedtson, Emil, kapten, direktör, Göteborg, f. 11/6/88 i Hällaryd, Blek. 1., av Sven C. o. Emelie Jeppsson, G. 18 m. Lisa Leffler. Barn: Sven f. 19, Ingrid 21,. Astrid 25. — Offiex. 08, intendiex. 13. Kapt. v. intend:kåren 17. Dir. v. Jonsereds Eabr. A-B 18, verkst. dir. i Ekström & Lefflers A-B 28, i A-B Eol 38. Ordf. i Partilie komm:fullm. 21-25, ordf. i styr. f. A-B Gatu- o. Vägbeläggn :ämnen 28, i Sv. grossist :förb. 35-38 o. i A-B Ica 39. RVO, REinlVROlkl.
translated: Clemedtson, Emil, captain, director, Gothenburg, b. 11/6/88 in Hällaryd, Blekinge County, son of Sven C. and Emelie Jeppsson, married Lisa Leffler in 1918. Children: Sven b. 1919, Ingrid b. 1921, Astrid b. 1925. Officer in 1908, in intendancy corps in 1913. Captain in intendancy corps in 1917. Director of Jonsereds Eabr. A-B in 1918, managing director at Ekström & Lefflers A-B in 1928 and at A-B Eol in 1938. Chairman of the Partille municipal council from 1921 to 1925, chairman of the board for A-B Gatu- o. Vägbeläggn :ämnen from 1928, and chairman of the Swedish Wholesale Association from 1935 to 1938 and A-B Ica in 1939. RVO, REinlVROlkl.

awards.name: Royal Norwegian Order of Merit (Commander 1st Class)
